item.dc:creator: @Zlacki Zlacki
item.description:
@Zlacki wrote:

[quote=“iBoss, post:63, topic:536951”][quote author=C-4 link=topic=655769.msg4410411#msg4410411 date=1393439801]

This server is awesome. At first I had some problems with it but the admins do listen to the players and make changes, it’s active with lots of old school players and fun as hell. check this out, just earlier today. http://i.imgur.com/xNRCiTH.png

Anyone smart enough know its around 7-8 players mass login to increase count. I recognize lot of names in the list and i can exactly say there max 10 unique IP. Guess who’s ddosing RSCE+RSCR to get players?

Supporting this server admin is like saying; Keep ruining RSC community here my money.

If you think only 10 of those are unique ID’s you’re either retarded or insane. I know for a fact (from playing the server every day and knowing people on it) at least 40 of those accounts are unique. Stop being mad dude it’s a good, fun server so don’t hate.
[/quote]

Look. We know the RSC scene . We know people in this screenshot. We actually know who’s who. We know the admins and we know he get other server ddosed to get players and is also here for $.

As for bernard hes one of the childish person you can find on RSC. Dont know how he even got admin in the first place. Show how there is no structure. Also Bernard is known to give free stuff to his friends. So imagine what hes doing with his spawn command.[/quote]
It’s funny, as Bernard is probably the most mature one on the staff. If you’d gotten to know the admins before jumping on them, you’d realize that you’re wrong in almost every statement you’ve made on here.
We do not even have an item command for spawning, as we feared it would be abused; it has never been abused and can’t be abused by Bernard or any other administrator. We have nothing to do with the ongoing attacks, and Awknet’s blocking attacks of our own.
Stop slandering us or I’m going to have a mod clean up the thread.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @x7zifle x7zifle

@x7zifle wrote:

My opinion, this server is truly fun. The content is new and has updates for more additions. No cities have been edited by a map editor so it feels more like RSC, overall great server.

item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

[quote=“iBoss, post:56, topic:536951”][quote author=fatmick1690 link=topic=655769.msg4406390#msg4406390 date=1392122079]
i would just like to say the videos that you put at the start hyper are not from cirnopk the are from hixk other server which failed
[/quote]
Also the fact that most user online are people who multi logs like crazy. The other day there was 12 online and a guy with 7 accounts. That server is dead and boring + bad staff team and greedy admin[/quote]

The point of the videos was to show the gameplay of the server. We have current videos of the same content on the new server, but when we first started, we didn’t. The point of the videos was to show the gameplay of the server. Also, cirnopk is one of the few stable servers left in the RSC community and we’ve been steadily growing. We averaged around 20 users online throughout today.

We have had absolutely no complaints from any of our users and our staff team is mature and does a better job at treating all of our players equally than any other server in the community.

Read full topic
